title: Swisspers Premium Exfoliating Rounds, 2 Distinct Raised Textured Surface, Cotton Facial Pads, 80 Count Re-closable Bag
description: Size: 80 rounds | Style: Exfoliating Rounds. Swisspers Premium Exfoliating Rounds, 2 Distinct Raised Textured Surface, Cotton Facial Pads, 80 Count re-closable bag. Gently scrub away makeup and dull skin with our premium 100% cotton rounds. One side features a micro-bead surface for soft exfoliation, while the other side is embossed for light cleansing and applying lotions or astringents.
